0010101111100111 0111110101100010 1 -> sum: 1010100101001010, cout: 0
0010111100100010 0100110000000010 1 -> sum: 0111101100100101, cout: 0
1101111111110111 0001001101110111 0 -> sum: 1111001101101110, cout: 0

0010101100110001 1010010100011111 1 -> sum: 1101000001010001, cout: 0

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
